content: cord until the gusset section decreasing round 1 k to last 3 sts on the needle k2tog k1 k24 k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decreased row 1 rs *sl1 k1 repeat from * to end of the needle decreasing round 2 k row 2 ws sl1 p to end of the needle repeat decreasing rounds 1 and 2 six more times 24sts repeat row 1 and 2 eleven more times for a total of remain on each side 12 repeats repeat row 1 one more time foot and toe heel turn continue in plain stockinette k every stitch until the setup a ws sl1 p13 p2tog p1 turn sock measures 2 /5cm shorter than the total desired setup b rs sl1 k5 ssk k1 turn length abbreviations row 1 ws sl1 p to 1 st before gap made by previous decreasing round a k to k knit turn p2tog p1 turn last 3 sts on needle p purl k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to row 2 rs sl1 k to 1 st before gap made by previous k2tog knit 2 together last 3 sts on needle turn ssk k1 turn p2tog purl 2 together k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to ssk slip 2 sts knitwise repeat row 1 and 2 until all sts on needle are included end of round 4 sts move both to left in the turn 14st remaining on needle the final two decreased needle and k2tog row will end at p2tog/ssk do not turn after working decreasing round b k through back of loop last row 2 sl1 slip_stitch repeat decreasing gusset co cast on rounds a and b five rs right side more times 24 sts ws wrong side decreased total st s stitch es remove marker and k to bor beginning of the end of needle shift round both sides onto needles dn darning needle each with 12 sts follow grafting directions in dpn section © 2021 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
